mapper.sql: record_id, member_id, combo_id, store_id, detail_id, combo_name, combo_price, combo_image, project_amount, project_count, remaining_count, overdue_time, create_time, is_deleted, update_time, last_operator_id
mapper.select: select record_id, combo_id, combo_name, combo_price, combo_image, project_amount, project_count, remaining_count from member_combo_record where member_id = #{memberId} and is_deleted = 0 order by create_time desc
select record_id, combo_id, combo_name, combo_price, combo_image, project_amount, project_count, remaining_count from member_combo_record where detail_id = #{detailId} and is_deleted = 0

select a.record_id, a.combo_id, a.combo_name, a.combo_price, a.combo_image, a.project_amount, a.project_count, a.remaining_count , a.overdue_time, a.create_time, (select concat(d.employee_code, ' ', d.name) FROM employee_info d where d.employee_id = a.last_operator_id and d.is_deleted = 0) as lastOperatorName, (select c.store_name FROM store_info c where c.store_id = a.store_id and c.store_status != 5) as storeName from member_combo_record a where a.member_id = #{params.memberId} and is_deleted = 0 order by a.create_time
mapper.insert:
insert into member_combo_record
record_id,
member_id,
combo_id,
store_id,
detail_id,
combo_name,
combo_price,
combo_image,
project_amount,
project_count,
remaining_count,
overdue_time,
create_time,
is_deleted,
update_time,
last_operator_id,
#{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{comboId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{detailId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{comboName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{comboPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{comboImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{projectAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{projectCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{remainingCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{overdueTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{lastOperatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update member_combo_record
member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
combo_id = #{comboId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
detail_id = #{detailId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
combo_name = #{comboName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
combo_price = #{comboPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
combo_image = #{comboImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_amount = #{projectAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
project_count = #{projectCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remaining_count = #{remainingCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
last_operator_id = #{lastOperatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
